DOC.brief_title: Compare Subperiosteal Loco-Regional Anesthesia Posterior Mandible Dental Implant Installation
DOC.detailed_description: Inter/Intra observer agreement make administration local subperiosteal , loco-regional anesthesia , operatory evaluation pain radiologic examination . One group receive articaine 1:100.000 , 4 % epinephrine subperiosteal 1:100.000 4 % epinephrine loco-regional dental implant installation posterior mandible . The evaluation parameter focus intraoperatory pain , Intraoperatory anesthetic complication , anesthetic efficiency , correlation distance implant inferior alveolar nerve , intraoperatory pain , post-operatory 3 10 day correlate change , survival rate dental implant post osseointegration period .
DOC.criteria: Single unit implant rehabilitation Maxilla mandible Must accept treatment plan Must sign inform consent dental extraction perform least 3 month prior Must least 6 mm residual bone Absence oral lesion keratinize tissue must present If smoking and/or drug addiction present If local anesthetic allergy present Patient subject chemical radiotherapy Hepatic disease present If immunodepression present If Pregnancy present If Diabetes present If Heart disease present
